duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service to clients, representing the company in a positive and professional manner.
Handle customer inquiries and issues with effective verbal and written communication.
Navigate multiple platforms and guide phone conversations while providing customer support.
Maintain efficient computer navigation skills, multi-tasking, and taking notes during customer interactions.
Effectively communicate with customers and colleagues in a team environment.
Demonstrate self-discipline, patience, and efficient time management while handling customer support activities.
